description: Manages viewing and clearing of various application logs from the admin panel.

methods.name: app
methods.description: Displays paginated logs from the 'app_logs' database table.

methods.name: clearAppLogs
methods.description: Clears all entries from the 'app_logs' database table.

methods.name: media
methods.description: Displays a log of media files sent through the bots.

methods.name: telegram
methods.description: Displays paginated logs from the 'telegram_error_logs' database table.

methods.name: deleteTelegramLog
methods.description: Deletes a specific entry from the Telegram error log.

methods.name: clearAllTelegramLogs
methods.description: Clears all entries from the 'telegram_error_logs' table.

methods.name: publicErrorLog
methods.description: Displays the content of the public error log file.

methods.name: clearPublicErrorLog
methods.description: Clears the content of the public error log file.

methods.name: viewFileLog
methods.description: Displays a list of log files from the '/logs' directory or the content of a specific log file with pagination.

parameters.name: $logFileName
parameters.description: The name of the log file to view. If null, a list of files is shown.

methods.name: clearFileLog
methods.description: Clears the content of a specific log file in the '/logs' directory.

parameters.name: $logFileName
parameters.description: The name of the log file to clear.
